text: Lola Albright (July 20, 1924 - March 23, 2017) was an American actress. She has been in many movies. She was a fashion model before her acting career. Albright was born and raised in Akron, Ohio. Albright died at her home in Toluca Lake, California on March 23, 2017, aged 92. ==References== Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Ohio Category:1924 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Models from Ohio
title: Lola Albright
